subject: Re: [junit] help: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: junit-4/1/jar
msgSnippet: A vague answer to a vague question - check your classpath to ensure JUnit 4 is there as expected. -- Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
messageBody:
A vague answer to a vague question - check your classpath to ensure
JUnit 4 is there as expected.
--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/
